sections.text: 260.013 Definitions.—As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires:

sections.heading: Sponsorship of state greenways and trails.
Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires:(1)“Board” means the Board of Trustees of the Internal Improvement Trust Fund
sections.text: (2)“Department” means the Department of Environmental Protection.(3)“Designation” means the identification and inclusion of specific lands and waterways as par
